sentences: The FCCC subsidiary bodies held their tenth sessions in Bonn, Germany, from 31 May - 11 June 1999, and began the process of fulfilling the BAPA.
SBSTA considered topics such as Annex I communications, methodological issues and the development and transfer of technology.
SBI discussed, inter alia, administrative and financial matters and non-Annex I communications.
SBI and SBSTA jointly considered the mechanisms of the Kyoto Protocol, AIJ and compliance.

A joint SBI/SBSTA Working Group on compliance (JWG) discussed identification of compliance- related elements, including gaps and suitable forums to address them; design of a compliance system; and consequences of non- compliance.
enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
